title: Aztec Ruins National Monument: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       Aztec Ruins provides many resources for teachers. Call the visitor center to reserve a traveling trunk of replica artifacts for use in your classroom. A teacher's guide, full of readings and lesson plans, is available to download and print from this website. Aztec Ruins is a great destination for a field trip. Rangers are also available to give free presentations in local classrooms on a variety of curriculum-based topics.  Â     Students working in the Heritage Garden during a service-learning field trip sponsored by the National Park Foundation. NPS Photo
